thread.title: Fatima defeats Blair Oaks in softball sectional
thread.title_full: Fatima defeats Blair Oaks in softball sectional

title: Fatima defeats Blair Oaks in softball sectional
text:
NT Rewards! Fatima defeats Blair Oaks in softball sectional The Class 2 softball sectional showdown between Blair Oaks and Fatima gets started Wednesday evening in front of a full house in Wardsville. Photo by Brandon Foster . Wednesday, October 14, 2015 Share 
WARDSVILLE, Mo. -- Sammey Bunch hit the game-winning home run and set the state's single-season hit record at 66 on Wednesday evening as Fatima got past Blair Oaks 1-0 in Class 2 sectional softball action. 
The Lady Comets improve their season record to 20-9, while the Lady Falcons end their season with a 19-5 record. 
Fatima will host a Class 2 quarterfinal on Saturday against Centralia (23-3), which downed South Shelby 10-0 on Wednesday. 
Look for this page to be updated later with News Tribune sports reporter Brandon Foster's complete game write-up, which also will be published in Thursday's News Tribune newspaper. 
Brandon filed the following reports live on Twitter during the game: Twitter Brandon Foster reports Fatima's Sammey Bunch hits a leadoff triple, setting an all-time state record with 66 hits in a season. #mopreps — Brandon Foster (@BFoster91) October 14, 2015 Bunch is tagged out at home on a fielder's choice, however, and Blair Oaks and Fatima are tied after one inning. #mopreps — Brandon Foster (@BFoster91) October 14, 2015 Payton Staggs strikes out the side and Blair Oaks and Fatima are still scoreless after two in this softball sectional. #mopreps — Brandon Foster (@BFoster91) October 14, 2015 Just one hit between the two teams as Blair Oaks and Fatima are scoreless after three innings in Wardsville. #mopreps — Brandon Foster (@BFoster91) October 14, 2015 Still scoreless after four between Blair Oaks and Fatima. Erica Fick gets game's second hit but Lady Falcons force double play. #mopreps — Brandon Foster (@BFoster91) October 14, 2015 Another inning, another pair of zeroes from Macy Berhorst and Payton Staggs. Fatima and Blair Oaks are scoreless after 5 innings. #mopreps — Brandon Foster (@BFoster91) October 14, 2015 Carli Buschjost breaks Macy Berhorst's no-hitter but Blair Oaks can't score. Sammey Bunch then leads off bottom 6th with solo HR. #mopreps — Brandon Foster (@BFoster91) October 15, 2015 Blair Oaks down to its last chance. Fatima leads sectional game 1-0 after six innings on Sammey Bunch's home run. #mopreps — Brandon Foster (@BFoster91) October 15, 2015 FINAL: Fatima defeats Blair Oaks 1-0 in softball sectional. Sammey Bunch hits game-winning HR, sets state single-season hit record #mopreps — Brandon Foster (@BFoster91) October 15, 2015 
6:14 p.m. - Fatima's Sammey Bunch hits a leadoff triple, setting an all-time state record with 66 hits in a season. 
6:15 p.m. - Bunch is tagged out at home on a fielder's choice, however, and Blair Oaks and Fatima are tied after one inning. 
6:24 p.m. - Payton Staggs strikes out the side and Blair Oaks and Fatima are still scoreless after two in this softball sectional. 
6:36 p.m. - Just one hit between the two teams as Blair Oaks and Fatima are scoreless after three innings in Wardsville. 
6:47 p.m. - Still scoreless after four between Blair Oaks and Fatima. Erica Fick gets game's second hit but Lady Falcons force double play. 
6:57 p.m. - Another inning, another pair of zeroes from Macy Berhorst and Payton Staggs. Fatima and Blair Oaks are scoreless after 5 innings. 
7:06 p.m. - Carli Buschjost breaks Macy Berhorst's no-hitter but Blair Oaks can't score. Sammey Bunch then leads off bottom 6th with solo HR. 
7:10 p.m. - Blair Oaks down to its last chance. Fatima leads sectional game 1-0 after six innings on Sammey Bunch's home run. 
7:18 p.m. - FINAL: Fatima defeats Blair Oaks 1-0 in softball sectional. Sammey Bunch hits game-winning HR, sets state single-season hit record ﻿
